thread.title_full: Watch This Engrossing Time-Lapse Of Jupiter Created By Amateur Astronomers From Around The World - Indiatimes.com

title: Watch This Engrossing Time-Lapse Of Jupiter Created By Amateur Astronomers From Around The World - Indiatimes.com
text:
Shreya Kalra February 26, 2017 Only a few can dream of travelling to space and revelling in the mystic essence of the universe. 
Reuters 
A team of amateur astronomers from around the world have created a time lapse of the largest planet in the solar system, giving us a means to wallow in the glory of Jupiter. 
Youtube/A Journey To Jupiter This video was pieced together by 91 amateur planetary photographers from the world over. They pointed their telescopes at Jupiter from December 2014 to March 2015 and captured over 1,000 photographs. You can watch the “Journey to Jupiter” here . Don't Miss
